title: JMIERR Men's Casual Stylish Short Sleeve Button-Up Striped Dress Shirts Cotton Beach Shirt
description: Fabric: 65%Polyester, 35%Cotton, soft and comfortable. You May Wear The Shirts As Dress Shirts Or As Casual Shirts, All Up To Your Personal Like.
Design: Stylish casual short sleeve stripes button down shirt. This wardrobe-essential shirt features an easy, flattering fit. Perfect gifts for your boyfriend, son, husband, and yourself.
Occasion: cruise, resort, office, work out, casual wear, outdoor, beach vacation, perfect to match with jeans or pants.
Garment Care: Machine Wash Cold, Air Dry, Do Not Bleach. This lightweight fabric make it a great option year-round and never goes out of style.
Package Content: 1 X Men's Shirts. Please Refer to the JMIERR Size Chart before Ordering, Not Amazon Size Chart.
